sentences.sentence: It is France versus Brazil in the final.
sentences.translation: 决赛是法国队对巴西队。

sentences.sentence: Italy versus Japan is turning out to be a surprisingly well matched competition.
sentences.translation: 意大利对日本队的比赛结果是一场出人意料地势均力敌的比赛。

sentences.sentence: Only 18.8% of the class of 1982 had some kind of diploma four years after high school, versus 45% of the class of 1972.
sentences.translation: 相对于1972届学生中有45%在中学毕业4年后获得了某种文凭来说，1982届学生的这一比例只有18.8%。
